name: Primm Slim
descriptions: Primm Slim is a robot residing in the Vikki and Vance Casino in Primm, acting as a tour guide for the small-time museum in the building, in the Mojave Wasteland in Fallout: New Vegas.

A Protectron programmed to be an "authentic cowpoke," Primm Slim is a pre-War staple of the town of Primm, having been purchased sometime prior to 2077 and customized by the owner of the Vikki and Vance Casino to act as its official spokesbot.

By a stroke of good fortune, Slim was able to weather the nuclear apocalypse and decades of inactivity with hardly any faults or breakdowns, eventually being restored to working order by new residents of the town and resuming his post in the casino.

His perfect record however did not remain spotless for long. Sometime around October 2281, Sammy and Pauline Wins, a pair of wannabe outlaws, hacked into Slim to erase his memory of their successful theft of Vance's 9mm submachine gun and other relics from the casino's museum, planning on starting their own life of crime.
Primm Slim appears in Fallout: New Vegas. He also makes a brief cameo appearance in the credits sequence of the Fallout TV series episode "The Innovator."
Xbox 360 Sometimes Primm Slim can be found destroyed outside the NCR base opposite Primm.

topics.response_text: Howdy pardner! Welcome to the Vikki and Vance Casino and Museum.

topics.topic: PrimmSlimAboutBisonSteveTell me about the Bison Steve.
topics.topic_text: What about the Bison Steve hotel, across the street?
topics.response_text: {clears throat}The Bison Steve is one of Primm's less-impressive casino hotels. I'd steer clear of that place, pardner, if I were you.
Why, this is the Vikki and Vance Casino and Museum - Primm's Primm-eer tourist attraction and resort destination! Yeehaw!
Primm Slim at your service! Authentic cowpoke and official spokesbot of the Vikki and Vance Casino and Museum! Yeehaw!
Primm is a thriving resort community located in Clark County, Nevada, right along Interstate 15.

topics.topic: PrimmSlimGunDid you know that Vance's gun is missing?
topics.topic_text: Did you know that Vance's gun is missing?
topics.response_text: Just mosey on over to the display case and you'll see it plain as day. Quite a piece, that gun. Mint condition. Never fired.

topics.topic_text: The display case is empty. The gun's missing.
topics.response_text: Have you gone loco, pardner? I can see the gun with my own three photo sensors from where I'm standing right now.
Dang it. I hope you'll keep looking.

topics.topic_text: Scan your data registry. You've been hacked.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] <Primm Slim buzzes and whirs while he reformats.>

topics.topic_text: I found the gun. Here it is.
topics.response_text: Those thieves had some gall, stealing from a museum dedicated to romanticizing a couple of criminals!

topics.topic: PrimmSlimSheriffReprogram Primm Slim to serve as Primm's Sheriff.
topics.topic_text: <Reprogram Primm Slim to serve as Primm's Sheriff.>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Bzzzt... Law Enforcement Protocols reinstated, pardner. Initializing use of force authorization... authorization found. Yee-haw!

topics.topic: PrimmSlimSheriff2Reprogram Primm Slim to serve as Primm's Sheriff using parts.
topics.topic_text: <Reprogram Primm Slim to serve as Primm's Sheriff using 3 fission batteries and 4 conductors.>
topics.response_text: Bzzzt... Law Enforcement Protocols reinstated, pardner. Initializing use of force authorization... authorization found. Yee-haw!

topics.topic: PrimmSlimSomethingElseOk then, let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Yessir, you just tell ol' Primm Slim what you'd like to know.
Have it your way, pardner. Maybe work up your curiosity by having a look at thrilling exhibits like the genuine Death Car and Vance's machine gun!

topics.topic_text: Tell me the whole story of Vikki and Vance.
topics.response_text: Yahoo! I ain't had a chance to tell their tale in a mess of years.

topics.topic: PrimmSlimWhoIsVikiAndVanceTell me about the Vikki and Vance
topics.response_text: Where have you been, pardner? Hiding under a rock?

topics.topic: VMS02AnyNPCAboutNCRAny idea what the NCR's up to in Primm?
topics.topic_text: Do you know if the NCR has any plans to attack the prison north of here?
topics.response_text: There's a prison north of here? Well, don't go picking up any hitchhikers and you should be all right.

combat.response_text: {Primm Slim:}Loading Public Appeasement Oration... complete. Howdy... citizens. How about a yee-haw for law and order in the fine town of ERROR: TOKEN NOT FOUND?
